No one had told me this before and I almost felt betrayed that I had experienced my array of side effects for so long and no one else had told me that my birth control could be causing them. I am not saying that Sprintec or all oral contraceptives are bad, I just wish that physicians were more aware of the potentially disruptive side-effect of lowered testosterone in their female patients when they are taking oral contraceptives.
